adviseScripts.text: Honey!
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: If you had to choose between simple and fancy, what would it be?
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: Simple.
Fancy.
I knew I could count on you!
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: I wanted to do a little something different with my nails this time around. You must have sensed it!
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: Hmm, I was thinking of doing something a little different with my nails this time around...
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: but if you prefer a fancy look, then I'll go with that.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: I spend time watching Viper paint her nails.
A or B? Choose one.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: No questions.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: A.
B.
Darn.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: Viper grabs my hand and lifts it up to her mouth.
*Smooch*
If you get it right next time, I'll kiss you somewhere else!
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: Wow, really?
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: Viper grabs my shoulder and pulls me close.
*Smooch*
Well? Happy with your choice?
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: Hmm... you don't seem too happy...
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: Should I have prepared something more substantial?
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: Viper smiles mischievously.
When you're drinking a milkshake,
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: do you eat the cherry right away, or save it for last?
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: I usually eat it first.
I save it for last.
Same here.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: That way no one else can eat it before you do.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: Hehe!
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: Really? I like to eat it straight away.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: If you try and save it for later,
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: someone greedy like me could come along and snatch it up!
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: I go with Viper to get a milkshake.
Tell me, Honey.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: Do you prefer the Ark, or the surface?
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: The surface.
The Ark.
There aren't enough people up there for me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: I need to be somewhere where there are a lot of people, and lots of fun things to do.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: You can't do that up on the surface.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: Haha!
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: Me too!
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: Since the Ark has a lot of people,
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: you can do all sorts of fun things!
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: Viper and I talk more about how fun it is living in the Ark.
Ahem...
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: Viper taps my toes lightly with hers.
Ahem...
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: Her toes creep up past my foot and towards my ankle.
Ahem!
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: Her toes move up towards the inside of my calf.
Grab Viper by the ankle.
Run away from Viper.
Ow, not so rough!
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: That hurts, you know!
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: Rather than manhandle me, you could just run away...
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: Hehe, sorry Honey.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: Did I surprise you?
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: Aren't you just the cutest thing?
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: I spend time flirting with Viper.
Do you prefer crows or snakes?
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: Crows.
Snakes.
Really?
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: But crows are so dark and forbidding...
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: I didn't expect you to be into that kind of thing.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: I knew we'd agree.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: Snakes are way better than crows.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: They're so cute and cuddly!
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: Viper and I talk more about our favorite animals.
I wonder,
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: should I tell you about a secret I've been hiding?
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: If you tell me, what will you want in return?
You don't need to tell me.
My Honey is one step ahead, as always.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: Don't think of it as me wanting something in return.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: It's just that if we exchange our deepest and darkest secrets, you and I...
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: Might become closer than we were before.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: Would you like that?
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: You don't have to be so standoffish...
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: I was trying to get a little closer to you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: Don't you want that?
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: Viper and I share some of our secrets with one another.
The weather is so nice today!
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: I want to go somewhere.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: Want to go shopping?
Want to go on a date?
I like shopping as much as the next person, but don't you have any other ideas?
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: I feel like with shopping, we'd just stare at some items for a while before saying goodbye, and that's it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text:
I want to do a lot of other things with you,
not just shopping...
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: I'd love that!
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: What should we do? We could go for a walk in the park...
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: That way we could be alone...
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: I talk with Viper about what we would do when we go to the Ark.
Jackal is such a brown-noser.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: It's like she can't even think for herself.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: If Crow told her to jump off a bridge, she'd probably do it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: Do you think that's why Crow likes Jackal more than me?
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: Are you jealous of Jackal?
You have plenty of your own positive qualities.
Absolutely not!
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: How could anyone be jealous of a mindless sycophant?
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: Hey, you're right!
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: I'm me, and no one else. I don't have to be like Jackal.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: I'd hate spending my life as a brainless lackey. How could I ever be jealous of Jackal?
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: Besides, if there's anyone whose affection I'm after,
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: it's you, not Crow.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: So I was hoping... you could show me some affection...
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: I take my hand and caress Viper's face.
What's the best thing about living in the Outer Rim?
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: I don't know.
I get to see you often.
While I appreciate your honesty,
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: you should try a little harder to come up with something.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: If someone from the Outer Rim heard you say that, they might feel hurt.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: Pssh, you're really laying it on thick.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: You're only saying that because you couldn't come up with an actual answer.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: Nevertheless... it does make me feel good hearing that.
*Smooch*
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: I talk a little more about the Outer Rim with Viper.
Honey! One of our squadmates sold out to the Ark in exchange for a place to live there.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: They've been feeding them information on what the Boss, Jackal, and I have been up to the past few days.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: They've been on us like white on rice, asking us all sorts of questions.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: It's enough to make your blood boil.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: I managed to catch them in the act yesterday.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: What do you think I should do with them?
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: Just don't kill them.
Come on, don't you trust me?
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: Nobody's going to kill anybody.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: Why aren't you saying anything?
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: Are you nervous?
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: Wait, do you think I'm planning on killing them?
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: Give me some credit.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: Who am I going to kill when I've got this around my neck?
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: Besides, I believe in having "an eye for an eye, a tooth for a tooth". I won't go overboard.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: I never do anything more than it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: That's just kindness for you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: I have a sweet but dangerous session with Viper.
When you're eating candy,
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: do you like eating it in one bite, or letting it melt slowly in your mouth?
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: Eating it all in one bite.
Letting it melt slowly in my mouth.
No way! Eating it that way is no fun.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: If you eat it all in one bite,
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: you don't even get to taste it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: Nice! Isn't it the best?
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: It's no fun eating it all in one bite.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: If you let it melt slowly,
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: you can really appreciate the flavor.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: I share a candy with Viper.
Honey, who do you think is in a worse position?
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: Someone who steals, or someone who gets stolen from?
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: Someone who steals.
Being stolen from.
Hmm, I think the opposite.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: If something is precious to you, then you should be able to keep it safe.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: If you can't do that, then you're better off letting someone else have it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: How am I the bad guy,
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: when nobody can look after their valuables properly?
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: I feel the same way.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: Everyone else seems to think the person who steals is in the wrong, so I'm always painted as the bad guy.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: But I always say that if someone really values something, they'd do a better job of protecting it!
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: If you can't keep something safe, then you're better off letting someone else have it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: I discuss with Viper how best to protect things precious to us.
If I didn't have this choker on my neck,
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: what do you think would be the first thing I'd do?
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: ... Kill me?
... Terrorize the Ark?
What? How can you say that?
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: I'd never kill you! You've been so nice to me. I'm not totally heartless, you know.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: Why would I waste my newfound freedom on killing you?
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: If anything, I guess I'd give you a choker.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: One the same as mine, so you could wear it around your neck.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: Huh? That sounds more like something Crow would do.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: I'm a bit more low-key.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: Seeing people run about in a panic doesn't do much for me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: I much prefer latching onto a single person and giving them my undivided attention.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: That's what gives me the most joy.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: I have a somewhat unnerving conversation with Viper.
I am in a fantastic mood today!
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: Wanna guess why?
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: Because the weather is nice?
Because today is our scheduled counseling day?
Nope!
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: I just had a killer deal go through without a hitch.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: I sold some bombs to these little kids, and they didn't know any better, so I was able to pull a fast one on 'em!
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: Oh, right! It'd be nice if we kept this whole arms deal thing on the down-low.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: You won't tell anyone, will you?
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: Wow, I hadn't even thought about that.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: I was feeling good because these young kids I sold some bombs to didn't know their butts from a hole in the ground, and I made a killing.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: But now that I think about it, I guess I am happy that I get to talk to you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: Oh, right! It'd be nice if we kept this whole arms deal thing on the down-low.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: You won't tell anyone, will you?
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Viper about the things that make us happy.
Do you believe that the feelings you have for other people
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: are always reciprocated?
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: I do.
What do you think?
You think so?
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: Is that why you're so fond of other Nikkes?
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: Oh, I didn't startle you, did I?
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: Don't worry, I don't really care all that much.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: Hey, are you answering my question with another question?
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: Well... I suppose I don't mind it too much.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: Viper throws her arms around my neck.
To answer your question, I'm not sure. So...
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: How about you and I look into it, just the two of us?
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: I spend time with Viper finding out about love.
Any chance you can end our session a little early today?
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: I've got something to do.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: Okay.
What is it?
You're not even going to ask me what it is?
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: Thanks for trusting me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: In that case, since our time together is short today, let's get a little closer.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: If I told you, you'd stop me from doing it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: This is not a personal matter, so don't go all jealous on me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: I have a short but rewarding session with Viper.
Have I ever told you
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: how innocent you are?
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: ... Is that a compliment?
I'm not as innocent as you think I am.
Of course it's a compliment!
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: I love people who are nice and innocent like you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: Don't ever change.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: Haha, that's a good one!
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: If you were a bad apple, then the Captain would really have egg on her face.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: Having said that, if you ever want to take a walk on the wild side,
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: feel free to get in touch with me, hehe!
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Viper about what makes a partner charming.
Honey, do you like alcohol?
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: I do.
I don't.
Cool.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: What about you?
It's not so much that I like alcohol itself. It's just that...
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: If you drink with someone, you speak more freely and say what's on your mind.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: Viper grabs a bottle of alcohol from the refrigerator.
How about we have a drink together?
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: Not even a little bit?
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: I'm not a teetotaler.
Whew, that's a relief!
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: Viper grabs a bottle of alcohol from the refrigerator.
In that case, how about we have a drink together?
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: I have an honest conversation with Viper while drinking.
I'm not really in a good mood today.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: My makeup didn't come out right, and my hair is a mess.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: I didn't expect you to care about stuff like that.
We can always reschedule our session for another time.
Of course. Physical attributes are useful in many ways.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: Everyone's a sucker for a pretty lady. I have an easier time persuading people.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: I wonder if that applies to you as well?
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: You really don't know how to take a hint, do you?
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: If I didn't want to talk to you, then I wouldn't have come.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: I always feel a little better when I see you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Viper

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Viper about the powers of physical attributes.
